title: Patch requests
content:
Hi
does anyone know where these patches are (if they have been used before) or know how to make them?
I haven't been able to find these ones anywhere.

- Gargs turn into yorps when shot.

- Yorps kill keen.

- Yorps 'charge' like gargs.

- Gargs shoot like tank-bots.

- Yorps aren't stunned.

- No sound when the lights are turned off and on at the end.


I'll need these before I can continue with Keenwarp1 (a keen1 mod I have been working on)

Thanx.

[img]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b33/freeyorp101/sig2.png[/img]

[hr]

The yorp shalt inherit the mars

title: Re: Patch requests
content:

- Gargs turn into yorps when shot.
I might be able to do this one (i'll have to see). But do you want dead yorps or living yorps?


- Yorps kill keen.
#yorps *kill* keen
%patch $188B $03 $00


- Yorps aren't stunned.
#Can't stomp yorps
%patch $18A5 $90

Thats all i could do. -Genius314

title: bah
content:
Well, here's the thing. There's currently three different "FreeYorp###" accounts at K:M. Two of them, FreeYorp071 and FreeYorp101, are registered to Ben131093 (at) hotmail (dot) com. The third, FreeYorp181, is registered to FreeYorp101 (at) hotmail (dot) com.

Of the three accounts, FreeYorp101 has been activated, and should be able to post messages. Try logging in to that one.

All three accounts were registered in November 23 of 2005. Why did you need three accounts? :-(

title: Re: oops
content:
Well, lets look at those patches;

- Gargs turn into yorps when shot.

A much wanted but difficult patch; someday I may actually figure it out.


- Yorps kill keen.

This should work; it works for me.

# Killah yorpz.. (beware yorps now)
%patch $188B $03 $00

- Yorps 'charge' like gargs.

A somewhat complex patch will be required to patch Garg movement routines into the Yorp sprite; you can either draw yorps as gargs, I can make a patch so that the garg uses the yorp frames, or you can alter the yorps speed to make it faster:

# yorp movement- left speeds = $FF $FF MINUS desired speed
%patch $18D4 $C4 $FF # [si+20] left speed
%patch $18CD $3C $00 # [si+20] right speed
%patch $19C2 $C4 $FF # [si+20] left speed
%patch $19CE $3C $00 # [si+20] right speed
%patch $1964 $80 $00 # [si+22] yorps jump higher when this is higher
%patch $1A1C $C4 $FF # [si+20] left speed
%patch $1A14 $3C $00 # [si+20] right speed


- Gargs shoot like tank-bots.

Can't be done as of yet.


- Yorps aren't stunned.

#Can't stomp yorps [As seen above]
%patch $18A5 $90

- No sound when the lights are turned off and on at the end.

For this patch we look for the lightswitch sound in the sounds.ck1 file; we find CLICKSND is sound 31 [$19] So we search the Keen executable for this value; there are 11 occurences, but only one of these is near the switch code; at 35DB, now we set the sound value to $04 [$90 $90 makes an interesting noise] which is almost silent.

#Change the switch sound to be quiet:
%patch $35DB $04 $00

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

$90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90
%patch $1DAD $4F $19
%patch $1DA8 $68 $1A

Can't be done as of yet.[hr][/quote]

Darn...

title: freeyorp
content: Alright, FreeYorp, things should be cleared up.  You've got FreeYorp101, and the duplicates have been deleted.  :-)

title: Re: freeyorp
content:
RIGHT!

First a virus, then a computer crash, but so help me I'm posting this dammit!

First we look at the vorticons patch you found; there are several things we can alter:

[quote]Quote:[hr]# dead vort turns into yorp
%patch $1D8D $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90
%patch $1DAF $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90
$90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90 $90
%patch $1DAD $4F $19
%patch $1DA8 $68 $1A
%patch $1DA3 $30 $00
%patch $1D98 $00 $02 $00[hr][/quote]

The first two lines; nuh-uh; they do the neat dying code stuff like the flashing border, let them be.

Line 3 however controls the sprite spawned by the dying vort; it can be anything:

[quote]Quote:[hr]#$4F $19 #acts like a Yorp
#$51 $1B #acts like a Garg
#$0E $1C #acts like a Vorticon
#$C7 $1D #acts like a butler bot
#$75 $1F #acts like a robot
#$60 $33 #no movement, never disappears
#$E8 $47 #stays stationary, then disappears
#$08 $48 #zaps/zots when hits something?
#$9D $48 #sinks down changing sprite images
#$21 $51 #normal movement, then disappears[hr][/quote]

Now the fourth line controls what the yorp spawn when it gets shot; the dead vort yorp isn't like the usual yorp:

[quote]Quote:[hr]#$68 $1A #creates dead yorp when shot
#$CE $1B #creates dead garg when shot
#$6E $1D #creates dead vorticon when shot
#$94 $1E #shots zot/zap against it, it keeps going and goes farther than usual if shot
#$45 $20 #shots zot/zap against it, it keeps going
#$A6 $22 #hits keen and is destroyed, shots make zot/zap against it
#$BB $22 $creates falling block when shot
#$60 $33 #nothing special happens
#$00 $4A #zots/zaps against keen
#$49 $48 #shots zot/zap against it, it's destroyed[hr][/quote]

Line five is the sprite the spawned sprite uses to orient all its other spritey... things. In this case its the first yorp sprite, others are:

[quote]Quote:[hr]Yorp $30 $00
Garg $3C $00
Vort $46 $00
Bot $58 $00
Tank $62 $00
Ice $70 $00
Chain $72 $00[hr][/quote]

The sixth and last line controls how the sprite affects Keen:

[quote]Quote:[hr]#00 $00 #no sprite is created
#$01 $00 #nothing
#$02 $00 #pushes keen, if you jump on it right, a stunned yorp emerges
#$03 $00 #kills (used by gargs)
#$04 $00 #kills (used by vorticons)
#$05 $00 #pushes keen (used by robot)
#$06 $00 #pushes keen (used by butler bot)
#$07 $00 #shots zap/zot against it
#$08 $00 #shots zap/zot against it (used by falling block)
#$09 $00 #shots zap/zot against it
#$0A $00 #shots zap/zot against it
#$0B $00 #kills (used by robot shots, can also kill vorticons and gargs)
#$0C $00 #nothing (used by mini ice cubes)
#$0D $00 #shots zap/zot against it
#$0E $00 #nothing
#$0F $00 #freezes/stuns keen[hr][/quote]

This allows as you can see,a lot of variation; you can make almost any sprite of any properties emerge from the dying yorp

Pretty much all the patches ever created so far for all the episodes of Keen can be found all listed togethere here: [url=http://levellord.toxicsheep.com/Index/]levellord.toxicsheep.com/Index/[/url] Its very useful.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord
